info.michaelkohler.helpertools.properties

Class PropertiesHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.michaelkohler.helpertools.properties.PropertiesHelper

  • public class PropertiesHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    The |PropertiesHelper| is a full API for Java's Properties. It supports every action you can do with Properties.
    Version:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Michael Kohler
